summary: Learn about .WCLD2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: WordClouds.com specializes in creating word clouds in different shapes, colors, and sizes. Examples of when you might create a word cloud include describing a loved one, classroom rules, and business values.
After creating a word cloud, you can export it as an image or video for sharing purposes. You can also order it as a canvas or framed print through the service.
NOTE: WordClouds.com replaced classic.wordclouds.com, which saves word clouds as .WCLD files.
